content: If there are no entries in Saved Passwords, you would be prompted for one when TB connects to the mail server, such as when TB is restarted. At that point, check the box in the prompt to have the password saved. That is, unless passwords are managed by an external app of the kind that is part of some security suites.
creator: sfhowes

content: Delete the Thunderbird program directory and reinstall from thunderbird.net.
creator: wsmwk

content: Wat fijn om te horen dat u de missie van Mozilla wilt steunen. Voor het doen van een donatie probeert Mozilla dit met zo weinig mogelijk persoonlijke informatie te verwerken. Meer informatie daarover kunt u vinden op https://foundation.mozilla.org/nl/donate/help/#frequently-asked-questions.
creator: Mozilla-assistent
